about_the_game:
The Little Cuttle goes to battle with megacorporation that is trying to take over the world!

Use various weapons of your mech against the enemy army of robots, but be careful not to run out of ammo (each of the eight unique weapons uses its own ammo).
Don't forget about repair and upgrade your combat vehicle to be able to defeat all bosses (you can spend earned score points on what you need).


You should help your friends who are working to solve the problem of marine pollution.
(Dr.Roman K, Dr.Mary K, Ms.Doggo, Dr.Song-Gun, Sr.Okchana and Todd)

One of the scientists team members turned out to be a traitor, he stole the supercomputer
(which was supposed to control squads of cleaning robots) developed by the team.
The only working prototype with all the blueprints fell into the hands of the megacorporation.
At the moment the supercomputer controls robot workers converted into soldiers.


Your mission is to find a repeater (provides communication between robots and the supercomputer) at each of the game levels and bring it to the submarine
(mobile scientific lab) of your scientist friends.
This will help track the location of the traitor's laboratory and get the stolen back.

GAME FEATURES

  • True 1-Bit graphics (only black and white colors + "Color Filter" setting).
  • Seed based level generation from 250+ handmade chunks
    (each chunk can be in five different state modes).
  • Five different locations (Oil Platform, Junk Yard, Robot Factory, Lunar Base, Secret Lab).
  • Mobile scientific lab where you can buy ammo, repair and upgrade your mech
    (you can also try your luck with the bonus machine).
  • Eight powerful weapons (each weapon is unique in its own way).
  • "New Game +" that guarantees unique drop from all bosses over five rounds
    (special powerful modules that you can install in the mech).
  • Full controller support (including rumble).


!!! PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO FOLLOW AND ADD THE GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST !!!

name: The Little Cuttle Goes To Battle
short_description: The Little Cuttle Goes To Battle is 1-Bit 2D Shooter with seed based level generation from handmade chunks (250+ unique chunks in game). To help your scientist friends who are working to solve the problem of marine pollution you need to defeat the megacorporation and its army of robots.
